newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Qantas sells 112 mln Air NZ shares.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Qantas sells 112 mln Air NZ shares.

text.p: Qantas Airways Ltd said on Wednesday it had accepted an unsolicited offer from ANZ Securities Ltd to buy the 112 million Air New Zealand B-class shares held by Qantas.
Qantas chief executive James Strong said the Air New Zealand shares were sold for NZ$3.80 per share and the capital gain for Qantas from the sale would be about A$99 million before tax.
"The proceeds of the sale will decrease net debt, reducing gearing by 3.3 percent on a hedged basis," Strong said in a statement.
Qantas shares were four cents lower at A$2.43 just ahead of the market close on Wednesday.
Air New Zealand B shares closed at NZ$3.95, up five cents.
Rumours had circulated the New Zealand market on Tuesday that Qantas was considering the sale of its 19.4 percent stake in the New Zealand airline, putting pressure on the airline's share price.
